info.name: workflowy narrow
info.description: That's it! This style make the workflowy page narrow so you can better use it in a split screen situation on a smaller monitor when, say, transferring text into or from workflowy. Just enable/disable this theme whenever you want.
info.additionalInfo: You can easily edit this theme too, to choose the maxwidth you want. Just change where it say "450px" to whatever number of pixels you want.
